channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP

item.title: CVE-2024-41732|2024-08-13T03:58:36.444Z -- sap_se -- sap%20netweaver%20application%20server%20abap
item.description: SAP NetWeaver Application Server ABAP allows an unauthenticated attacker to craft a URL link that could bypass allowlist controls. Depending on the web applications provided by this server, the attacker might inject CSS code or links into the web application that could allow the attacker to read or modify information. There is no impact on availability of application.
